title: Haye-Bellew may 'need a fence'
text:
Haye vs Bellew: Eddie Hearn eager to separate David Haye and Tony Bellew in Liverpool By James Dielhenn & Andy Scott Last Updated: 27/02/17 6:38am David Haye and Tony Bellew may require a “fence” to keep them separated at Monday’s pre-fight press conference, promoter Eddie Hearn has claimed. 
Haye was notoriously shielded from Dereck Chisora by a metal fence in 2012 and could be segregated from his upcoming opponent on Monday in Liverpool, Bellew's home city. 
"My original plan was to keep them eight-ten feet apart but I'd like them face to face," Hearn exclusively told Sky Sports. We've got to make sure the precautions are in place. Eddie Hearn 
"The only way we can do that is with something separating them. A Perspex wall? If there's any fence suppliers, favourable rates apply, and we'd be very pleased with some assistance.
